name: Recovery Spec
desc:
Continue to enhance the ability to use Valor Bash.
Radiant Impact is accompanied by Radiant Impact, and when Radiant Impact hits an enemy target, it taunts them.

name: Holy Light Time Limit
desc: During Aegis Ward, when Expertise deal Crit DMG, there's a 50% fixed chance to instantly reset 1 Holy Sigil CD (prioritizing Holy Sigil with the longest remaining CD). This effect triggers only once when hitting multiple targets.

name: Radiant Guard
desc: Casting Shield Toss immediately grants a Radiant shield equal to 100% ATK (depending on Adventurer Level, up to 200%). The Overdrive of Shield Toss +1.

name: Divine Circle Defender
desc: While within the Divine Circle, the Armor effect provided by Valor Bash +30%.

name: Oracle
desc:
When a skill that consumes Holy Sigil critically hits, gain an additional 30% Light Energy.
Crit DMG of skills that consume Light Energy +30%.

name: Reckon Blaze
desc:
When Valor Bash deals Crit DMG, gain Blazing.
Casting Aegis Ward guarantees Blazing.
Blazing: For the next 10s, Reckoning evolves into Inferno Reckon.

name: Shield Impact
desc: Hold Valor Bash to charge, then dash forward a short distance.

name: Holy Barrier
desc: After casting the Ultimate, leaves a Holy Barrier that blocks damage for friendly targets within the area. The Holy Barrier disappears after taking total damage equal to 200% of the caster's Max HP or after 15s.

name: Reckon Shield
desc: Each time Inferno Reckon or Reckoning deals Crit DMG to 1 enemy target, Block chance +5%, lasting for 10s, stacking up to a maximum of 5 layers.

name: Lightforged Balance
desc:
When your HP percentage is higher than your target's, DMG taken from that target -5%.
When your HP percentage is lower than your target's, Judgment deals 50% more DMG.

name: Ultimate Guard
desc: For 10s after casting Shield Toss, increases Block Chance by 15%.

name: Holy Summon
desc: When Shield Toss or Judgment deals DMG, 10% chance to trigger Divine Strike. If Crit DMG is dealt, the chance increases to 50%.

name: Divine Circle Resonance
desc: For each enemy inside Divine Circle, increases Divine Circle DMG by 25% and Divine Circle Healing by 5% (caps at 10 enemies).

name: Halo
desc: Divine Circle now has a halo effect, stunning enemy targets for 3s the first time it deals DMG.

name: Fearless Shield
desc: Each time Shield Toss deals DMG, gains Radiant Shield equal to 25% ATK (this ratio is affected by Adventurer Level, up to 50%).

name: Sword Dance
desc: When a Expertise Skill critically heals, gain a 15% healing bonus.

name: Shield Guard
desc: When Valor Bash deals Crit DMG, restores HP equal to 120% ATK.

name: Aegis Ward's Anthem
desc: For every 2 Holy Sigils consumed, the remaining CD of Aegis Ward -1 second.

name: Holy Heal
desc: While having Radiant Shield, gains 12% healing bonus.

name: Judgment of All Beings
desc: When Judgment hits only 1 enemy target, its damage +25%.

name: Ultimate Strike
desc: When Divine Strike deals DMG, increases Strength by 2% for 10s, stacking up to 5 times.

name: Lightforged Greatsword
desc:
After every 10 casts of Judgment, the next Judgment is enhanced into Scorching Judgment.
Scorching Judgment: Summon a holy greatsword to descend upon the target area for 5s, healing yourself (Healing equal to that of Judgment) while dealing damage over time to nearby enemies and inflicting Scorch, totally dealing physical DMG equal to 600% ATK (scales with Judgment level/rank).
Scorch: Reduces damage taken from the target by 3% for 10s. Stacks up to 10 times. Grants 3 stacks of Scorch on Crit.

name: Light Chain
desc: While Aegis Ward is active, the chance of Divine Strike is doubled. Every 3 times Divine Strike is triggered, the duration of Aegis Ward is extended by 1 second.

name: Divine Circle Blessing
desc: While within the Divine Circle, your Healing Receive effect +10%.

name: Light Protection
desc: While having Radiant Shield, gain 5% Lightal Bonus.

name: Judgment Revelation
desc: When Divine Strike Crits, there's a 50% fixed chance to automatically cast Judgment on the target (this Judgment cannot trigger Divine Strike).

name: Aegis Ward's Retribution
desc:
During Aegis Ward, Block chance is increased to 1.5 times.
When attacked, reduces Aegis Ward's remaining CD by 0.5s. This effect can only trigger once per 1 second.
